about_the_game:
"Transmogrified!" is a funny and adventurous RPG which follows the journey of a boy named Xander. After being chased by bullies into a dark forest, he trips on a tree root and falls into a pool of glistening mud. When he awakens, he finds himself in an underground realm where his body is transformed into one made of animated mud.

Granted the ability to throw mudballs by the same magic that TRANSMOGRIFIED! him, Xander embarks on a quest through elemental stages of Wind, Water, Earth, and Fire, to save themselves and others trapped in this surreal world. Each stage presents unique challenges, from battling creatures and navigating treacherous terrain to befriending quirky elemental beings and solving puzzles.

Along the way, our new hero learns elemental lore, tames helpful creatures as pets, and collects precious gems and metals. The game features an immersive world filled with quirky humor, obvious dad jokes, bizarre pop culture references, and accompanied by custom sound effects and a dynamic soundtrack ranging from spooky to triumphant. With a message of hope and perseverance, "Transmogrified!" is a heartwarming tale of an underdog becoming a hero and journeying home, suitable for all audiences.

TRANSMOGRIFIED! features the following:
* 50+ missions and quests
* 25 unique creatures
* 5 Unique boss Characters
* 10 types of pets
* 4 character classes
* 20 unique spells
* 20 attack types
* 20 magical rings
* 20 magical charms
* 6 precious gems
* 6 semi precious gems
* 6 metals
* 6 reactive metals
* 4 elemental realms - Wind - Water - Earth - Fire
* Mysterious Final Realm
* 10k+ lines of dialogue
* intricate storyline & plot

Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

short_description: Escape the elemental world of TRANSMOGRIFIED! Journey through bizarre realms of Wind, Water, Earth and Fire while seeking to solve the mystery of those who have been TRANSMOGRIFIED. Save those you meet along the way, and return yourself back to human form. BEWARE THE MUDMEN!
